net.floodlightcontroller.util

类 OFMessageUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.util.OFMessageUtils

  • public class OFMessageUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Tools to help work with OFMessages. Compare OFMessage-extending objects (e.g. OFFlowMod, OFPacketIn) where the XID does not matter. This is especially useful for unit testing where the XID of the OFMessage might vary whereas the expected OFMessgae must have a set XID.
    作者:
    Ryan Izard

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean equalsIgnoreXid(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage a, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage b)
      Returns true if each object is deeply-equal in the same manner that Object's equals() does with the exception of the XID field, which is ignored; otherwise, returns false.
      static void writePacketOutForPacketIn(IOFSwitch sw, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn packetInMessage, org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort egressPort)
      Writes an OFPacketOut message to a switch.

    • 方法详细资料

      • equalsIgnoreXid

        public static boolean equalsIgnoreXid(org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage a,
                      org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFMessage b)
        Returns true if each object is deeply-equal in the same manner that Object's equals() does with the exception of the XID field, which is ignored; otherwise, returns false. NOTE: This function is VERY INEFFICIENT and creates a new OFMessage object in order to the the comparison minus the XID. It is advised that you use it sparingly and ideally only within unit tests.
        参数:
        a; - object A to compare
        b; - object B to compare
        返回:
        true if A and B are deeply-equal; false otherwise

      • writePacketOutForPacketIn

        public static void writePacketOutForPacketIn(IOFSwitch sw,
                             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.protocol.OFPacketIn packetInMessage,
                             org.projectfloodlight.openflow.types.OFPort egressPort)
        Writes an OFPacketOut message to a switch.
        参数:
        sw - The switch to write the PacketOut to.
        packetInMessage - The corresponding PacketIn.
        egressPort - The switchport to output the PacketOut.
